version_description: Critical bug fixes and UX improvements

version_name: Updates – ability to view and remotely update Brain software versions on SL-XXX brains.* Custom Aspect Ratios – specify custom aspect ratio for newly created or existing user interfaces.* Un-provision Space in the Manager – ability to un-provision a space

version_description:
Bug Fixes
* Corrected issue where it was taking up to 13 seconds to load the control interface when the client apps are loaded from the background
* Corrected issue where Express Mode control was not working with mismatched Brain and Client app vers
